abstract: British business-events organizer UBM agrees to sell news-release distribution service PR Newswire to Cision for $841 million.
lead_paragraph: UBM, a British business-events organizer, sold the service as its latest effort to focus operations primarily on trade shows and event planning.

headline.main: PR Newswire Sold to Cision for $841 Million
headline.print_headline: Business Briefing; PR Newswire Is Sold by UBM for $841 Million

snippet: UBM, a British business-events organizer, sold the service as its latest effort to focus operations primarily on trade shows and event planning.
